data.title: Acuson X150 Ultrasound System (Refurbished) – Siemens – Vyzorb Medical
data.text:
The ACUSON X150™ ultrasound system combines an intuitively simple, yet powerful, user interface with highly functional ergonomics. Ultra compact and mobile, the ACUSON X150 system allows you to:

Take advantage of the large 15-inch, flat panel display mounted on an innovative articulating arm to optimize the position of the system and its folding monitor in virtually any environment

Customize exam reports to match workflow

Quickly store, recall and manage data with the DIMAQ-IP integrated workstation

Seamlessly integrate the system into networked environments with a full complement of plug-and-play connectivity solutions

Decide what’s needed — and when.

The ACUSON X150™ ultrasound system provides superior 2D-mode imaging and includes pulsed wave Doppler functionality providing high-quality audio and visual capabilities for spectral visualization and quantification of blood flow.

Powerful options — Add color imaging, cardiac screening, real-time 3D imaging or an additional array port to the ACUSON X150 system.

Support for a wide range of transducers — Imaging frequencies from 2–13 MHz are supported for various clinical applications, including:

General Imaging

Internal Medicine

OB/GYN

Urology

Small Parts

Endocrinology

Cardiac Screening

Cerebrovascular

Emergency Medicine

Pediatrics
